headline: Eversource Energy Declares Common Dividend
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. & BOSTON, September 11, 2025--The Board of Trustees of Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) today approved a quarterly dividend of $0.7525 per share, payable on September 30, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on September 22, 2025.
